fj.data
Class Tree<A>

java.lang.Object
  fj.data.Tree<A>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<A>
public final class Tree<A>
extends Object
implements Iterable<A>

Provides an immutable, non-empty, multi-way tree (a rose tree).

Version:
2.17
  • $LastChangedRevision: 5 $
  • $LastChangedDate: 2008-12-06 16:49:43 +1000 (Sat, 06 Dec 2008) $
  • Author: runar
